abstract: ed on position of Syria, Lebanon and Palestine
snippet: The British Government has underlined the seriousness of the British position in the Near East by announcing that it "could not allow Syria or Lebanon to be occupied by any hostile Power."...

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICA AND NEAR EAST AREAS

lead_paragraph: The British Government has underlined the seriousness of the British position in the Near East by announcing that it "could not allow Syria or Lebanon to be occupied by any hostile Power."
